text: Gregg Palmer (born Palmer Edvind Lee; January 25, 1927 - October 31, 2015) was an American television and movie actor. He was known for his roles in Gunsmoke, Death Valley Days, and The Virginian. He guest starred five times on Bonanza, NBC's longest-running western. He was born in San Francisco, California. Palmer died at the age of 88 in Encino, California from unknown causes. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Gregg Palmer
